publications.title: Unraveling Indirect In-Context Learning Using Influence Functions
Test-time backdoor mitigation for black-box large language models with defensive demonstrations
Assessing LLMs for Zero-shot Abstractive Summarization Through the Lens of Relevance Paraphrasing
Incentivizing News Consumption on Social Media Platforms Using Large Language Models and Realistic Bot Accounts

news.content: Test-time backdoor mitigation for black-box large language models with defensive demonstrations was accepted at NAACL-Findings'25.
Assessing LLMs for Zero-shot Abstractive Summarization Through the Lens of Relevance Paraphrasing was accepted at NAACL-Findings'25.
Presented Incentivizing news consumption on social media platforms using large language models and realistic bot accounts at the Trust & Safety Research Conference at Stanford University.
Incentivizing news consumption on social media platforms using large language models and realistic bot accounts was accepted at PNAS Nexus.
Started 3 Month Internship as a Machine Learning Research Intern at Pinterest Research Labs.
Revisiting Zero-Shot Abstractive Summarization in the Era of Large Language Models from the Perspective of Position Bias was accepted at NAACL'24.
Started 3 Month Internship as a Machine Learning Intern at the Comcast Media Analytics Team.
A Utility-Preserving Obfuscation Approach for YouTube Recommendations was accepted at PETS'23.
Attended the second annual ProperData Symposium at UC Irvine.
Attended the UC Noyce Initiative Symposium '22 at UC Santa Barbara.
Presented at the UC Davis Noyce Workshop.
Started 3 Month Internship as a Machine Learning Intern at the Comcast Media Analytics Team.
Attended the ProperData Symposium at UC Irvine.
Joined the PhD program at UC Davis.
